name: Lost Underground
description:
*Entry for the Yogscast Jingle Jam Game Jam 2020*

This 2D platformer takes you deep underground as you search for a lost miner. Learn to wield a sword, dodge and destroy pests and enemies, hurdle obstacles in your path, and try not to die! Good news: chests located throughout the levels give you...surprising abilities. Some will help, and others...well, you'll just have to see. Brave the mines, save the miner, and try to enjoy the surprises along the way!
